query:
-- Insert Reorder Alerts (using inventoryId from vaccineInventory table)
-- Get the inventory IDs and create alerts for low stock items
INSERT INTO reorderAlerts (inventoryId, alertType, quantity, status) VALUES
(8, 'low_stock', 30, 'active'),
(19, 'low_stock', 20, 'active'),
(24, 'low_stock', 20, 'active'),
(10, 'low_stock', 25, 'active'),
(3, 'expiry_soon', 30, 'active'),
(14, 'expiry_soon', 25, 'active');
